com.example.bot.spring

Class TimeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.example.bot.spring.TimeManager

  • public class TimeManager
extends java.util.Observable
    The class TimeManager is a subject in the observer pattern. In addition, it is a singleton class which only has one object. It implements a timer and notify its observers every hour at 0 minute.

        Returns:

      • timing

        public void timing()
        This method starts the timer at 0 minute in the next hour and notify the observers every hour. When the observers are notified, the time is recorded in the database.
